content.text: Not much! Just at the park working on some lessons.
I'm a student studying to be a nurse. I'm working on my patient care skills.
That's awesome! My mom is a nurse. What's your favorite part about nursing?
I love helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's so great! I'm sure you'll be a great nurse.
So what are you doing at the park?
I'm using my laptop to work on my lessons. I like to work in a place where there are people around, but it's not too loud.
That makes sense. I like to work out at the gym, but I can't stand being around people when I'm working out.
I know what you mean! I'm the opposite. I like the energy of being around people, but I don't like it to be too loud.
I guess we're opposites in that way.
I guess so! But it's good to have different perspectives.
Definitely! I like learning about different people and their experiences.
Me too! That's why I wanted to be a nurse. I want to learn about people and help them in any way I can
